headline: Can $10,000 in Altria Group Stock Turn Into $20,000 by 2030?
summary: A $10,000 investment in Altria stock five years ago would have more than doubled your money. Can the stock repeat that performance?

headline: Wall Street Lunch: AMC Entertainment Rallies As Audiences Return In Q2
summary: Shares of former meme darling AMC Entertainment (AMC) are rallying after the theater chain reported a significant beat for revenue in its second-quarter earnings report.

headline: USPS blocks major vape distributor over unregulated product shipments - Reuters
summary: Investing.com -- The U.S. Postal Service has barred New York-based Demand Vape from using its business shipping services after receiving evidence the company distributed unregulated e-cigarettes, letters reviewed by Reuters show.

raw.headline: USPS blocks major vape distributor over unregulated product shipments - Reuters
raw.summary: Investing.com -- The U.S. Postal Service has barred New York-based Demand Vape from using its business shipping services after receiving evidence the company distributed unregulated e-cigarettes, letters reviewed by Reuters show.

headline: Exclusive-USPS blocks shipping of illicit vapes in boost for Big Tobacco
summary: LONDON (Reuters) -The U.S. Postal Service has cracked down on distributors of unregulated vapes using its services for business shipments, letters reviewed by Reuters show, in a blow to a multi-billion dollar industry that has dented Big Tobacco's sales.  The letters, previously unreported, show that USPS wrote to major New York-based distributor Demand Vape, blocking it from using its services after New York City's Law Department, which represents the city's government and officials in legal matters, provided evidence that its shipments broke laws.  USPS' action stands to benefit tobacco giants including Altria and British American Tobacco, which have for years battled against unregulated vapes, mostly from China.
